title: Australian diary. No. 087
creator_credit: Australian National Film Board and Jack S. Allan
brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: at the Sydney Conservatorium of Music, a ballet, staged and created by a group of teenagers is performed and received enthusiastic praise from audiences; the making of whisky is shown requiring the skill of experts; hoops are used to provide children with a novel method of physical exercise.
